name: ask_image_question
description: Ask a natural language question about the content of a local image using Zhipu GLM-4V vision model.

image_path.description: Local path to the image file to analyze (e.g. './image_data/photo.jpg').

question.description: The question to ask about the image (e.g. 'What is the person doing in this image?').

max_tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens allowed in the response.

output_path.description: Optional path to save the result JSON (e.g. './outputs/answer.json').
